channel.title: [317] RS2 Remake client [317]
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][b]RS2 Remake Client Release 2[/b][/size][/center]
This is an updated version of my last Client
If you like my client or didn't like my client tell me in a comment. If there is something that you would like to see changed in my client tell me. All feedback is appreciated
**Im still not sure what the base of this client is because it came from a blank source. **I tried to implement some Anti-Leech measures, but Im not sure if itll work. **I still have not been able to get the 317 gameframe to work
[credits] Not sure who wrote the code for this client, so I wont put credits.
[center]Download Link: [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/34447976/Realease%20Clients/RS2%20Release%20Client_1.rar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/34447976/Realease%20Clients/RS2%20Release%20Client_1.rar[/url][/center]
This is what the original client looked like [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/RS2%20Client%20Release_1/originalclient.png[/img]
This is what it looks like now [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/RS2%20Client%20Release_1/NewClient.png[/img]
I remove the old GUI and Frame and added this one [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/RS2%20Client%20Release_1/NewFrame.png[/img]
I added the original 317 Inventory Icons [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/RS2%20Client%20Release_1/NewIcons.png[/img]
I changed the "_" to the "*" in the chat box - This was requested [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/RS2%20Client%20Release_1/NewChatTitle.png[/img]
Changed Welcome message to character select [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/RS2%20Client%20Release_1/NewWelcome.png[/img]
**These are changes that I made in the last client Changed the New HP Bar to the Original One [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/MoparScape%20Client%20Pics/evolved0026.png[/img]
Changed the loading bar to the Original one [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/MoparScape%20Client%20Pics/evolved0014.png[/img]
I changed the login box back to the Original login box [img]http://i1084.photobucket.com/albums/j414/boloros/MoparScape%20Client%20Pics/evolved0021.png[/img]

item.description:
@RetroScaper wrote:

I know it’s been FOREVER, but I have a really nooby question When I open the .exe to run the client, it simply says “Client is loading… Press any key to continue”. When I press a key, it just closes the file. HELP ME!!

Read full topic

This is an updated version of my last Client

If you like my client or didn’t like my client tell me in a comment. If there is something that you would like to see changed in my client tell me. All feedback is appreciated
